casebody.data:
BIO-MEDICAL
v.
NCDHHS. No. 549A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 25, 2006. Lee M. Whitman, Raleigh, Sarah M. Johnson, Winston-Salem, for Bio-Medical Applications. Thomas West, for Total Renal Care. Matt Woodward, Assistant Attorney General, for NCDHHS. S. Todd Hemphill, Raleigh, for Health Systems Management.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 634 S.E.2d 572.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of October 2006 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of October 2006."
